lyrics.text:
‘E kohai ‘e ala lau
‘Ofa ia ‘a Langi ē
Ki he koto hia ko au
Mo Māmani fulipē!
Mālō tau ki monū’ia
Maama angahala’ia.

Anga fai ‘a Langi ē
Tuku pe ki he tangata;
Na’a faifai pē te ne lava
‘A e langomi mei he mala.
Malo ngāue fai ‘i mu’a
‘A e kau helo ‘a e ‘Otua.

‘Ofa ē ka fakaofo,
Na’e ‘ikai ke fai ki ai!
Ka ne ngāue hifo leva
Palomesi ke fakaai;
Hako ‘a fefine ē
Te ne haveki ‘a Sētane.

Fakafeta’i ‘a e ‘ofa fau
‘Etau Tamai faka-Langi!
Ko e mate au ne pau
Kuo te lave fakamo’ui!
He ko Sīsū kuo Ne ‘omi
‘O Ne fai hotau langomi.
